name: Micro Miners
description: 'Micro Miners' is an addictive idle game where the main goal of the game is to unlock all of the cosmetic pets in your player's personal world. Earn credits from the hard work and hours that you put into the game to get the feeling of satisfaction when all of your hard work pays off!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, Mac OS X 10.9+, Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+. Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 86 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, Mac OS X 10.9+, Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+. Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 86 MB available space
